name: SAP S/4HANA
description: Integrate with SAP S/4HANA to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Business Partners
tools.description: List business partners from SAP S/4HANA. Returns partner names, IDs, categories, and addresses.

tools.name: Get Sales Order
tools.description: Get details of a specific SAP sales order by its ID. Returns order header, items, pricing, and status.

tools.name: List Materials
tools.description: List materials (products) from SAP S/4HANA. Returns material numbers, descriptions, types, and groups.

tools.name: Create Purchase Order
tools.description: Create a new purchase order in SAP S/4HANA. Specify vendor, items, and delivery details.

tools.name: Get Financials
tools.description: Get financial journal entries from SAP S/4HANA. Filter by company code, fiscal year, and posting date range.
